.. _changelog:

Changelog
=========

3.7.0 (Febrary 11th, 2017)
------------------------

* New: Compatibility with Django 1.10
* Dropped support for Django < 1.8
* Based on filebrowser v3.7.2


For further information, see :ref:`releasenotes`.
